tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RenewableEnergySources ( 
 id INT, 
 source_name VARCHAR(255), 
 technology_type VARCHAR(100), 
 region VARCHAR(100), 
 adoption_rate FLOAT 
 );

CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_sources (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(50),
    source_type VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50),
    capacity_mw DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE adoption_tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    region_id INT,
    tech_id INT,
    capacity_added DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE RenewableEnergySources (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    capacity FLOAT NOT NULL,
    region VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    installation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CleanEnergyTechnologies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technology_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    efficiency FLOAT,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE AdoptionStatistics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    year INT NOT NULL,
    adoption_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumption (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    year INT NOT NULL,
    consumption FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE GovernmentIncentives (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incentive_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    region VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);
